entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -4.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 9:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 40 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late this evening then changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the morning. High 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
